titleStmt.title: Musike of six, and fiue partes Made vpon the common tunes vsed in singing of the psalmes. By Iohn Cosyn.
titleStmt.author: Cosyn, John.

notesStmt.note: In five, or six?, partbooks. At least four of the partbooks each have separate dated title page and register. At head of title, part 1, "Altus."; part 3, "Quintus."; part 4 "Sextus". Part 2, tenor, also has separate dated title page and register, title reads: "Musike of fiue partes.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
